short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert one or more files in more formats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online HTML or PDF Converter. 
Drag or upload your PDF files directly from your file system and get a preview of the content within the extension, with details regarding the document information and a link that allows you to view the PDF in full-screen mode
================
Release 2.6.3 - Tabs permission removed
Release 2.6.2 (next release) - Fixed some bugs to convert online documents
Release 2.5.3 - Added updated pdfjs library to convert pdf files in client side webapp
Release 2.5.2 - Added some required permissions to file manifest of extension
================
Release 2.5.0
Convert urls of online web page or pdf documents with this extension browser using context-menu. See extension in action in screenshots below
=======================
Features
- Convert one or more flles PDF
- Immediate preview of the content
- Detailed PDF document
- Link to view your PDF in full-screen mode
- Zoom, rotate and fit to screen
- Printing
- Instant Download
- Pdf to image using context menu *
- Pdf to image from link of pdf file using context menu
* P.S. This feature of the context menu works just in web pages with the preview PDF and not all web pages - see the fourth screenshot
Release 2.0 - Now, when you want convert pdf to image using context menu, you can choose the second option "PDF to image with pagination"
Release 1.1.3 - Convert pdf to image in preview mode using context menu of your Chrome
Release 1.1.0 - Now You can convert PDF directly from link
